purpose: The email announces the eighth edition of the Software Engineering for Machine Learning Applications (SEMLA) symposium, scheduled for June 17-19, 2025, at Polytechnique Montréal, Canada. It invites practitioners and researchers to participate and contribute, highlighting the symposium's focus on AgentOps and Intelligent Systems. The email outlines the program structure, including keynotes, sessions, and tutorials, and provides details for poster contributions and registration deadlines.

evidence_sentences: The eighth edition of the Software Engineering for Machine Learning Applications (SEMLA) symposium will take place at Polytechnique Montréal, Montréal, Canada, from June 17 to June 19, 2025.
We invite practitioners and researchers from all related fields to participate.
The theme of SEMLA 2025 is AgentOps and Intelligent Systems, focusing on two transformative areas.
We accept poster presentations related to any of the SEMLA topics.
